name: Insectoids
startIntroPart1: An emerging empire of your precious insects, your children of workers and daughter queens. You must conquer this world to ensure your own existence, or must you?
startIntroPart2: The other animals you find disgusting, but also curious. You wonder what they desire, what are they doing, and most importantly, are they a threat?
declaringWar: (A torrent of furious and warring emotions suddenly enter your mind as telepathic waves bombard your mind as an image of a large Insectoid fill your mind, looking gnarled and bug-like in appearance with long legs, a large abdomen, and large pinchers on its mouth.)
attacked: (A wave of sudden fear fills your mind before the higher intelligence prods your mind with emotions of curisoity, anger, fury, and a deep desire to resolve this conflict as soon as possible.)
defeated: (You feel nothing as the Hive Mother dies a slow, agonizing death as she watches her young brood wither away and perish at your hands.)
introduction: (You feel a wave of telepathic emotion that resembles something of curiosity and wariness towards yourself.)
neutralHello: (A passing wave of emotional thought courses through you as you engage in communications with the Hive Mother)
hateHello: (Your mind aches and feels as if it is about to explode as the Hive Mother angrily communicates with you telepathically.)
tradeRequest: (The Hive Mother sends waves of telepathic thought that carry images which flood your mind of a resource she desires, and what she is willing to give.)
